ai:cl.c: Extends the Vector class with support for generating polygons.

ai:f.c: If true, the polygon will be closed between the start and end points.
Calibrates the user agent's distance-along-a-path calculations with that of the author.
A series of (X,Y) coordinates that define the polygon.
A series of numbered pairs that define the polygon.
The total number of coordinates defined in the Points field.
Defines the X coordinate of the first point.
Defines the X coordinate of the second point.
Defines the Y coordinate of the first point.
Defines the Y coordinate of the second point.
